document.full_text: portugal has become the first country to meet europe union fuel-efficiency goals for cars, and japan's toyota is the brand that is closest to meeting the same target across europe, a report showed on monday.
document.title: toyota, portugal top european fuel-economy rankings
lines_and_colors: portugal has become the first country to meet europe union fuel-efficiency goals for cars, and japan's toyota is the brand that is closest to meeting the same target across europe, a report showed on monday.
